content: I'm currently packing up all my belongings... {A思考}But moo, your planet probably doesn't have a place for me to stay just yet.
info: NPC邀请-模版-1011多杰朗_多杰朗

content: {A吉祥如意}Would you mind asking someone from <style=Highlight>Loomi Co.</style> to help me get settled? As soon as I have a place to stay, I'll HMM! Move right away.
info: NPC邀请-模版-1011多杰朗_多杰朗

content: {A吉祥如意}Mmmooo? I'm really sorry. What's head and shoulders above everything else for me is gathering materials to craft new hats. As for settling down... I haven't decided where.
info: NPC邀请-模版-1011多杰朗_多杰朗

content: If so, I'd be very grateful if you could help arrange a place for me to stay. {A看我的}For now, I'd better go pack up all my hats and luggage first.
info: NPC邀请-模版-1011多杰朗_多杰朗

content: Thank you so much for the invite! {A想象}Maybe once we get to know each other a little better, I'll give it more thought.
info: NPC邀请-模版-1011多杰朗_多杰朗

content: Much obliged for the invitation! I wonder... does your planet have any <style=Highlight>Loomi Co.</style> staff?
info: NPC邀请-模版-1011多杰朗_多杰朗

content: {A吉祥如意}Once you've picked a spot for my home with the <style=Highlight>Building Kit</style>, I'll HMM! Move here fast. Now moo, I need to go carefully pack up all my hats.
info: NPC邀请-模版-1011多杰朗_多杰朗

content: {A惊叹}HMM! Astonishing, our heads are thinking the same thing. I've been considering asking you if I could move to your planet too.
info: NPC邀请-模版-1011多杰朗_多杰朗
